# User Stories

Here are 8 user stories for the GiftLink application.

## 1. User Registration

**As a** new visitor  
**I want to** register for an account  
**So that** I can save my preferences and order history.  
**Label:** `new`

## 2. User Login

**As a** registered user  
**I want to** log in to my account  
**So that** I can access my profile and secure features.  
**Label:** `new`

## 3. Browse Gifts

**As a** customer  
**I want to** view a list of available gifts on the main page  
**So that** I can see what I can buy.  
**Label:** `new`

## 4. Search for Gifts

**As a** customer  
**I want to** search for gifts by name or category  
**So that** I can quickly find specific items.  
**Label:** `new`

## 5. View Gift Details

**As a** customer  
**I want to** click on a gift to see its details and condition  
**So that** I can decide if I want to purchase it.  
**Label:** `new`

## 6. Profile Management

**As a** registered user  
**I want to** update my profile information  
**So that** my contact details are current.  
**Label:** `technical debt`

## 7. Sentiment Analysis on Comments

**As a** user  
**I want to** see the sentiment of comments on a gift  
**So that** I can gauge others' opinions before buying.  
**Label:** `backlog`

## 8. Admin Dashboard

**As an** administrator  
**I want to** view a dashboard of all users and sales  
**So that** I can manage the platform effectively.  
**Label:** `icebox`
